mapper.select: select sum(hospitalcare_money) as hospitalcareMoney ,hospitalcare_date || '月' as hospitalcareDate from (select hospitalcare_money,extract(month from hospitalcare_date) as hospitalcare_date from hospitalcare union all select additional_money as hospitalcare_money ,extract(month from apply_time) as hospitalcare_date from applyrecord union all select prndebit_sum as hospitalcare_money,extract(month from prndebit_date) as hospitalcare_date from prndebit ) hos group by hos.hospitalcare_date order by hos.hospitalcare_date

select sum(payment_money) as hospitalcareMoney,extract (month from payment_time) || '月' as hospitalcareDate from payment_form group by extract (month from payment_time) order by extract (month from payment_time)
select count(*) as staffSum from staff
select sum(stock_surplus) as stockSurplus from drug_stock
select sum(payment_money) as paymentMoneys from payment_form
